name: OPTIM® 33TB
description: Optim® 33TB is one of the fastest and most effective cleaner & intermediate level disinfectants. OPTIM 33TB does not require any GHS hazard pictograms, signal words or statements. OPTIM 33TB is responsibly made and designed with the user in mind. OPTIM has demonstrated effectiveness against viruses similar to Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) on hard non-porous surfaces and non-invasive medical devices. This product can therefore be used against COVID-19 when used in accordance with the directions for use against Poliovirus on hard, non-porous surfaces, and non-invasive medical devices.
